name: Pilleve, Inc.
description: Developer of a remote monitoring system designed to reduce the risk of addiction to controlled drugs. The company's bottle aims to prevent the long-term costs associated with opioid abuse and addiction, enabling patients to receive optimal care while preventing the risk of addiction.
